title: Saudi Arabia condemned over activists' arrests
text:
Saudi Arabia condemned over activists' arrests Monday, May 21, 2018 - 01:21
International rights groups have condemned the arrests of at least seven prominent Saudi Arabian women's rights activists who previously campaigned for women's right to drive, which the conservative kingdom is set to grant from next month. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
International rights groups have condemned the arrests of at least seven prominent Saudi Arabian women's rights activists who previously campaigned for women's right to drive, which the conservative kingdom is set to grant from next month.
